title: sde2 | ola
content:
Education: B.E in CSE (Tier 1 College)
Years of Experience: 3.5 years
Current -SSE at Fintech firm(remote)
Current Comp- 26 fixed
Company: ola
Title/Level: sde2
Basic Salary: ₹ 32 LPA
Bonus- 1 LPA
Location- Bangalore
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33lpa
Other Benefits: In office benifits

Hi all,
I have been offered above compensation from ola. Is it worth to go for it or should I ask more?
Team- a very new one

Also can you tell me on work culture, hikes etc. (strictly told to work 50 hr/week)

title: Duetche Telekom Digital Labs | Backend Dev
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science(Tier 3)
Years of Experience: 3.6 + 10 months stiphend paid internship
Prior Experience: 2 Years in startup 1.6 in MNC (coforge)
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Deutsche telekom digital labs
Title/Level: Software Dev (Backend)
Location: Gurgaon .India
Salary: RS 1650000 (base)
Relocation: RS 0
Signing Bonus: RS 2,00000
Stock bonus: None
Bonus: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ RS 19.6LPA
Benefits: Food is free , free access to udemy and coursera , other standard benefits

Current Compensation:- 13.5 LPA (5% Variable) Been in the current MNC for 1.2 years


I was very much interested and pressing. They want me to join in 2 weeks. I told if you can provide the compensation, then I can join in 2 weeks timeframe. Initially I quoted 22LPA, then negotiated to 20.5 and now the compensation final offered is the above.

Thoughts ?

I have several MNC companies in pipeline like KPMG, Deloitte, and 2-3 medium service based offering me the similar package (not much of CTC difference) and I had already switched 3 organizations (1 out of which laid off me during recession and I worked there for 5 months).


Can you share your thoughts guys?
